channel.title: Small Business on the Web: Internet Marketing Podcast
channel.description: Small Business Web and Internet Marketing including website design and branding, content development and management, search engine optimization, web and email hosting, domain names, and other web site news.

image.title: Small Business on the Web: Internet Marketing Podcast

channel.itunes:author: Rick Breslin
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tips, Trends, and Techniques to Build an Effective Website
channel.itunes:summary: This series is dedicated to the resources, techniques, and latest trends to help you build an effective web presence for your small business. We focus on Small Business Web and Internet Marketing including website design and branding, content development and management, web and email hosting, domain names, and other web site news.
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This series is dedicated to the resources, techniques, and latest trends to help you build an effective web presence for your small business. We focus on Small Business Web and Internet Marketing including website design and branding, content development and management, web and email hosting, domain names, and other web site news.

item.title: Quick Tip - How To Change an Image into a Web Format
item.description: Do you need to change an image format? Maybe you need to convert a PNG to a GIF? Or, do you need an EPS file converted to a JPG? SnipShot.com is a very easy to use, web-based image editor that allow you to change image formats. We've put together this screencast video to help you with this process.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: Do you need to change an image format? Maybe you need to convert a PNG to a GIF? Or, do you need an EPS file converted to a JPG? SnipShot.com is a very easy to use, web-based image editor that allow you to change image formats. We've put together this screencast video to help you with this process.
item.itunes:summary: Do you need to change an image format? Maybe you need to convert a PNG to a GIF? Or, do you need an EPS file converted to a JPG? SnipShot.com is a very easy to use, web-based image editor that allow you to change image formats. We've put together this screencast video to help you with this process.
item.itunes:keywords: image formats, image editor, images for web, web site images, website image, web image format, image converter, convert image, JPG, GIF, PNG, EPS, PSD

item.title: How Much Is Your Web Site Worth?
item.description: Do you know how much your web site is worth? Rick interviews Tom O'Keefe with Bizak - an online business network which computes the profitability and valuation of Internet startups and connects entrepreneurs with investors.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: Do you know how much your web site is worth? Rick interviews Tom O'Keefe with Bizak - an online business network which computes the profitability and valuation of Internet startups and connects entrepreneurs with investors.
item.itunes:summary: Do you know how much your web site is worth? Rick interviews Tom O'Keefe with Bizak - an online business network which computes the profitability and valuation of Internet startups and connects entrepreneurs with investors.
item.itunes:keywords: web site worth, web site valuation, website estimate, business valuation, profitability, internet startup, startup, internet entrepreneur, internet investors, web site valuation calculator

item.title: Google Paid Search Clicks Are Down - Why?
item.description: Three reasons why Google paid search advertising clicks were down in January 2008 from the previous month. Financial news organizations overreact, resulting in a Google stock price drop, but Rick has a much more optimistic outlook.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: Three reasons why Google paid search advertising clicks were down in January 2008 from the previous month. Financial news organizations overreact, resulting in a Google stock price drop, but Rick has a much more optimistic outlook.
item.itunes:summary: Three reasons why Google paid search advertising clicks were down in January 2008 from the previous month. Financial news organizations overreact, resulting in a Google stock price drop, but Rick has a much more optimistic outlook.
item.itunes:keywords: paid search advertising, google, paid search clicks, online marketing, internet marketing, small business, online, google pay per click, ppc, google paid search, pay per click

item.title: Web 2.0 for Small Business - Does it work?
item.description: You've heard Web 2.0 as an Internet marketing buzz term, but is it right for your small business? Rick and James discuss the features and practices of Web 2.0 and how it could apply to your online marketing efforts.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: You've heard Web 2.0 as an Internet marketing buzz term, but is it right for your small business? Rick and James discuss the features and practices of Web 2.0 and how it could apply to your online marketing efforts.

item.itunes:keywords: web 2.0, web 20, online marketing, internet marketing, small business, online, web site design, website development, building websites, content management, web hosting, web

item.title: Quick Tip - Local Search Engine Marketing
item.description: Local search marketing is one of the best and easiest ways to get your website listed at the top of the major search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and Microsoft Live Search (without search engine optimization).
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: Local search marketing is one of the best and easiest ways to get your website listed at the top of the major search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and Microsoft Live Search (without search engine optimization).

item.title: Quick Tip - Email Signatures to Promote Your Business
item.description: Do you have an email signature? If not, you are missing out on an easy and under-rated form of marketing your business online. Here are some tips and guidelines to promote your business with branded email signatures.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive

item.title: Client Profile - LowellRocks.com
item.description: Co-founders Randy and Rob Breton are interviewed about how the website started and how it continues to expand its online community, and they also describe the business side of the site.

item.title: Quick Tip - Thank Your Web Host
item.description: Your web hosting provider deserves more credit than they receive. Take a few minutes out of your day and thank your website host for the service they provide.

item.title: Web Site Primer - 01 - The Planning Stage
item.description: Step 1: Planning for your web site. Establishing your online goals and objectives, setting up a timeline, indentifying your target audience, and calculating a budget for your website project.

item.title: Web Site Primer - 00 - Introduction
item.description: Introducing: 10 Steps to Web Success - A 10-episode audio primer and step-by-step guide to establishing an effective web presence for your small business. We will cover the essential steps to take for building your website and publishing the site online.

item.title: Domain Name Scams: Registrations and Transfers
item.description: Internet scams are everywhere, but there has been a large increase in the number of domain name registration scams. Learn about these scammers and how to protect yourself from losing your domain name and your money.
item.author: podcast@drivethru.us.com (Rick Breslin)
item.itunes:author: Drive Thru Interactive
item.itunes:subtitle: Internet scams are everywhere, but there has been a large increase in the number of domain name registration scams. Learn about these scammers and how to protect yourself from losing your domain name and your money.
